title: Design Logo
description:
Create a visually appealing and unique logo for the mini project. The logo should:
- Represent the project's theme and goals.
- Be compatible for use across multiple platforms (web, mobile, and print).
- Be delivered in various formats such as SVG, PNG, and JPG.

title: Make UI Design
description:
Develop an intuitive and user-friendly UI design for the mini project. Key steps include:
1. Researching user personas and usability goals.
2. Creating wireframes and mockups in Figma.
3. Sharing the finalized Figma link on Trello for feedback and collaboration.

title: Develop Frontend
description:
Build dynamic and reusable frontend components using React Native. This includes:
- Setting up the project structure.
- Implementing core UI features like navigation, forms, and data visualization.
- Ensuring responsiveness across different device screen sizes.

title: Setup Backend API
description:
Develop robust RESTful API endpoints using Express.js. Tasks include:
- Structuring the backend architecture.
- Creating CRUD operations for data management.
- Testing endpoints with tools like Postman or Swagger.

title: Database Design
description:
Design efficient and scalable MongoDB schemas. The design process involves:
- Identifying data requirements and relationships.
- Structuring collections and indexes to optimize performance.
- Implementing models using Mongoose.

title: User Authentication
description:
Implement a secure JWT-based authentication system, ensuring:
- User credentials are securely encrypted.
- Access tokens are issued with appropriate scopes and lifetimes.
- All routes requiring authentication are properly secured.

title: Testing
description:
Develop and execute unit tests for both frontend and backend components to ensure:
- Key functionalities are working as expected.
- Edge cases and potential failures are handled gracefully.
- Testing coverage meets or exceeds the project's standard.

title: Documentation
description:
Create comprehensive API documentation using Swagger. This should include:
1. Clear descriptions of all endpoints.
2. Request and response examples for each endpoint.
3. Authentication and error-handling details.

title: Deploy Backend
description:
Deploy the backend services to Heroku. Steps involved:
- Configuring environment variables for production.
- Ensuring the server is optimized for deployment.
- Monitoring deployment logs for troubleshooting.

title: Deploy Frontend
description:
Launch the frontend application on Vercel. The deployment process includes:
- Configuring Vercel settings for optimal performance.
- Linking the deployment with the production backend.
- Testing the live version for any issues.

title: Code Review
description:
Conduct a thorough code review to identify and address potential issues. Focus areas include:
- Refactoring for better readability and maintainability.
- Ensuring consistent coding standards across the project.
- Enhancing code performance where applicable.

title: Bug Fixing
description:
Address and resolve bugs reported by testers. This involves:
- Replicating reported issues to understand their causes.
- Applying appropriate fixes while avoiding regressions.
- Verifying fixes through rigorous testing.

title: Performance Optimization
description:
Optimize application performance to improve user experience. Tasks include:
- Minimizing load times by optimizing assets.
- Improving database query performance.
- Reducing memory and CPU usage in critical processes.

title: SEO Implementation
description:
Implement SEO best practices to increase the app's search engine visibility. This involves:
- Adding meta tags and structured data.
- Ensuring fast page loading speeds.
- Creating an XML sitemap and robots.txt file.

title: Analytics Setup
description:
Integrate Google Analytics tracking into the project. Tasks include:
1. Setting up a Google Analytics account.
2. Adding the tracking code to the project.
3. Configuring goals and events for actionable insights.

title: User Testing
description:
Conduct user testing sessions to gather feedback on the application. Key steps:
- Preparing test scenarios and scripts.
- Collecting qualitative and quantitative feedback from testers.
- Using insights to improve usability and functionality.

title: Security Audit
description:
Perform a security audit to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities. Areas of focus:
- Validating input sanitization and authentication mechanisms.
- Conducting penetration tests to simulate potential attacks.
- Applying security patches and updates as needed.

title: Content Creation
description:
Develop engaging and high-quality content for the landing page. Focus on:
1. Highlighting the app's features and benefits.
2. Using SEO-friendly copywriting practices.
3. Ensuring visual and textual content complement each other.

title: Email Integration
description:
Implement an email notification system to improve communication. The process includes:
- Setting up an SMTP server or email service provider.
- Designing and testing email templates for different use cases.
- Integrating the email system into the backend.

title: Final Review
description:
Conduct a final review of the project before launch. Steps involved:
- Verifying all features and functionalities work as expected.
- Testing across different devices and browsers.
- Preparing a checklist to ensure a smooth launch process.
